# Testing using ms test 

## Trying to add a book that is not in stock should be logged 

```csharp
var fixture = Fixture.ShoppingBasket(config => config
    .stockHandler.IsBookInStock(false)
);
var sut = fixture.CreateShoppingBasket();

await sut.Add("isbn 0-434-00348-4");
    
var logs = fixture.Calls.logger.Log(t => t.logLevel == LogLevel.Warning).ToList();

Assert.HasCount(1, logs, "Expected exactly one warning log.");
var actual = logs.Single();
Assert.AreEqual("Book isbn 0-434-00348-4 not in stock", actual.message);
```
